phrs.translation: 密西西比天谴, 密西西比女神
唱片名, 米西索加的诅咒

sentences.sentence: There's no need to be so goddam rude!
Keep your damn, I said. Keep your goddam kids from.
sentences.translation: 让你，我说道，让你的倒霉孩子离我。

sentences.sentence: SAL (from the family room) : Close the goddam door already!
sentences.translation: 萨尔：(从休息室)把那该死的门给关上！
